评论详情: Super soft and comfy
The quality is very very nice, I absolutely love it. The hoodie is so small though and I don't really like that. The actual fit is pretty nice so that's great
Great product at a reasonable price range.
it's comfortable and soft. It has a nice texture on the outside and the inside is like a white, squishmallowy fabric. Love the design!
Very nice good quality soft. Runs normal size
Good for fall and winter !

I love this hoodie SOOO much, the inside is so soft and comfortable, design is just as advertised, fits good everywhere else, but the sleeves are a tiny bit short when I raise my arms.  The material on the outside is corduroy or some type I think. It is so thick and very good quality, keeps me warm 100%, like this thing is HEAVY when I hold it. I also didn’t notice the stars on the strings, super cute and they make sure the strings dont go back into the hood when washing! Speaking of washing, doesn’t shrink or anything in the wash. Overall very cute, love it.

it's heavy, incredibly soft ( the material inside is best described almost like a plush toy/squishmallow) and true to the pictures. with amazon listings i usually assume i'll get less than advertised but even details like the stars on the hoodie strings are there. zipper is a little janky but i'm more than happy with this, especially for the price. recommend sizing up if you want it baggy & stylised, i did and it's perfect. :3
Great material very thick, it was for my daughter, looks like the picture in design but runs a little smaller. Up one size or even two if you want it to be very baggy.

评论概述: I could return it but i won’t :p
评论详情: Its a good jacket but is not oversized like i thought it would be. i think they come from an asian company so the sizing didn’t fit me like i wanted bitits coool! but overall the jacket is good. its decent for spring or fall probably even late night summer time. the strings are weirdly long tho has a corduroy texture on the outside and a thin fleece lining on the inside
Really nice sweater, super soft, and great quality.
I bought this for my 16 year old son. It took awhile to arrive and when it did, the zipper was broken. Completely inoperable. Contacted Amazon and received a refund, which I am thankful for.
This jacket is very stylish. The quality is great and my son wears it ALOT! Was a must have for his school clothes
Exactly as it looks in the images :) the words are a little higher and the stars are a bit darker but besides that it’s a great hoodie! Soft inside and the corduroy texture is very nice.
Love this sweatshirt.
Cozy material. Letter wasn't aligned but my daughter likes it.

It is such nice quality for the price. It is a thick jacket and on the inside it has super soft fleece. The pockets are also big enough to fit my phone and it was perfectly fine in my washer and dryer. It a while to arrive though but that’s fine!
Fit is fine, design is alright. But what upset me was how thin the actual material of the product is. Wouldn't really recommend for anyone looking to wear this in fall or winter.

The graphic is almost impossible to read. Does not look like the image. Feels nice though, and will probably be comfy. Too bad I bought it for a gift for someone else and am not happy to give it to them.
Love the price. Quality is not bad like above average but kids love it. Customer service is amazing.
Looks good definitely better then other Amazon products  Next time I will buy a large instead of medium, the sleeves are just a TAD bit short for 5’4 me
Ordered it at my grandson’s request. The fabric is thin and looks cheap to me; however my grandson is happy with it.
I wear it all the time Only negative is the inside is white so if you wear it off the shoulder you may see it But its very good and looks like the picture Also nice and warm
